tuv.seg: The civil service are the public officials who advise and assist Government Ministers in the running of their Departments
Is oifigigh phoiblí iad foireann na Státseirbhíse a chuidíonn leis na hAirí Rialtais ina Ranna Rialtais éagsúla
The Constitution does not mention the civil service but it is vital to the functioning of the state
Níl an Státseirbhís luaite sa Bhunreacht ach is páirt an-tábhachtach den chóras pairliminte í
The civil service has three main functions:
Tá trí phríomh ról ag an Státseirbhís:
• It advises the Government on policy
• Cuireann comhairle ar an Rialtas maidir le polasaí
• It helps prepare and draft new legislation and
• Cuidíonn siad in ullmhú agus i scríobh reachtaíochta nua agus
• It helps the Government to run the country according to the legislation passed by the Oireachtas
• Cabhraíonn siad leis an Rialtas chun an tír a rialú de réir rialacha dleathacha an Oireachtais
Each Department of State has a permanent staff consisting of administrative, professional, specialist and technical employees
I ngach Roinn Stáit bíonn foireann oibre buan déanta suas de fhoireann riaracháin, foireann phroifisiúnta, foireann saineolaithe agus foireann teicniúil
The head civil servant of each Department is the Secretary General, who is recommended by the Minister for that Department and appointed for a period of 7 years by the Government
I gceannas na státseirbhíseach i ngach Roinn tá Ard Rúnaí a ainmnítear ar chomhairle an Aire Rialtais agus a fhanann sa phost ar feadh tréimhse 7 mbliana
Below the Secretary General, there are a number of Assistant Secretaries, who are each responsible for specific areas of work in the Department
Ag leibhéal níos ísle ná an tArd Rúnaí sa státseirbhís tá méid áirithe Rúnaithe Cúnta agus tá gné faoi leith de obair na Roinne faoina gcúram
Below the Assistant Secretaries, there are many officials at varying levels of seniority
Síos uaidh sin aríst tá alán grádanna eile de Státseirbhísigh ag leibhéil éagsúla sinsearachta
Recruitment to the civil and public service
Earcú chuig an státseirbhís agus an tseirbhís phoiblí
The Public Appointments Service provides recruitment, assessment and selection services for the civil service
Cuireann an tSeirbhís um Cheapacháin Phoiblí seirbhísí earcaíochta, measúnaithe agus roghnúcháin ar fáil don státseirbhís
They also provide recruitment and consultancy services to local authorities, the Health Service Executive , An Garda Síochána and other public bodies
Cuireann siad seirbhísí earcaíochta agus comhairleoireachta ar fáil d’údaráis áitiúla, don FSS, don Gharda Síochána agus do chomhlachtaí poiblí eile
The Commission for Public Service Appointments is a separate body
Is comhlacht ar leith atá sa Choimisiún um Cheapacháin Seirbhíse Poiblí

The Commission sets standards, which it publishes as codes of practice, for recruitment and selection to the civil service, An Garda Síochána and a number of public service bodies, including the Health Service Executive

Leagann an Coimisiún síos caighdeáin, a fhoilsíonn sé mar chóid chleachtais, maidir le hearcú agus roghnúchán chuig an státseirbhís, an Garda Síochána, agus roinnt comhlachtaí seirbhíse phoiblí, lena n-áirítear Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte
